scripts.android:local: npm run lint && npm run tsc && react-native run-android --mode=localDebug --appIdSuffix=local
scripts.android:local:8082: npm run lint && npm run tsc && react-native run-android --port 8082 --mode=localDebug --appIdSuffix=local
scripts.android:dev: npm run lint && npm run tsc && react-native run-android --mode=devDebug --appIdSuffix=dev
scripts.android:release:dev: npm run lint && npm run tsc && react-native run-android --mode=devRelease --appIdSuffix=dev
scripts.android:build:apk:dev: npm run lint && npm run tsc && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDevRelease
scripts.android:build:aab:dev:legacy: npm run lint && npm run tsc && cd android && ./gradlew bundleDevRelease
scripts.android:build:aab:dev: npm run lint && npm run tsc && react-native build-android --mode=devRelease
scripts.android:sit: npm run lint && npm run tsc && react-native run-android --mode=sitDebug --appIdSuffix=sit
scripts.android:release:sit: npm run lint && npm run tsc && react-native run-android --mode=sitRelease --appIdSuffix=sit
scripts.android:build:apk:sit: npm run lint && npm run tsc && cd android && ./gradlew assembleSitRelease
scripts.android:build:aab:sit:legacy: npm run lint && npm run tsc && cd android && ./gradlew bundleSitRelease
scripts.android:build:aab:sit: npm run lint && npm run tsc && react-native build-android --mode=sitRelease
scripts.android:stag: npm run lint && npm run tsc && react-native run-android --mode=stagingDebug --appIdSuffix=staging
scripts.android:release:stag: npm run lint && npm run tsc && react-native run-android --mode=stagingRelease --appIdSuffix=staging
scripts.android:build:apk:stag: npm run lint && npm run tsc && cd android && ./gradlew assembleStagingRelease
scripts.android:build:aab:stag:legacy: npm run lint && npm run tsc && cd android && ./gradlew bundleStagingRelease
scripts.android:build:aab:stag: npm run lint && npm run tsc && react-native build-android --mode=stagingRelease
scripts.android:prod: npm run lint && npm run tsc && react-native run-android --mode=productionDebug --appIdSuffix=production
scripts.android:release:prod: npm run lint && npm run tsc && react-native run-android --mode=productionRelease --appIdSuffix=production
scripts.android:build:apk:prod: npm run lint && npm run tsc && cd android && ./gradlew assembleProductionRelease
scripts.android:build:aab:prod:legacy: npm run lint && npm run tsc && cd android && ./gradlew bundleProductionRelease
scripts.android:build:aab:prod: npm run lint && npm run tsc && react-native build-android --mode=productionRelease
scripts.ios:local: npm run lint && npm run tsc && react-native run-ios --simulator='iPhone 15 Pro' --scheme Local
scripts.ios:local:8082: npm run lint && npm run tsc && react-native run-ios --port 8082 --simulator='iPhone 15 Pro' --scheme Local
scripts.ios:local:device: npm run lint && npm run tsc && react-native run-ios --device='DMPFHJX7LM93' --scheme Local
scripts.ios:dev: npm run lint && npm run tsc && react-native run-ios --simulator='iPhone 15 Pro' --scheme Dev
scripts.ios:dev:device: npm run lint && npm run tsc && react-native run-ios --device='AccuV-iPad' --scheme Dev
scripts.ios:sit: npm run lint && npm run tsc && react-native run-ios --simulator='iPhone 15 Pro' --scheme Sit
scripts.ios:sit:device: npm run lint && npm run tsc && react-native run-ios --device='NDW456PDH3' --scheme Sit
scripts.ios:stag: npm run lint && npm run tsc && react-native run-ios --simulator='iPhone 15 Pro' --scheme Staging
scripts.ios:stag:device: npm run lint && npm run tsc && react-native run-ios --device='NDW456PDH3' --scheme Staging
scripts.ios:prod: npm run lint && npm run tsc && react-native run-ios --simulator='iPhone 15 Pro' --scheme Production
scripts.ios:prod:device: npm run lint && npm run tsc && react-native run-ios --device='NDW456PDH3' --scheme Production
scripts.prestart: npm run lint && npm run tsc
scripts.start:clean: npm run lint && npm run tsc && react-native start --reset-cache
scripts.start:debug: npm run lint && npm run tsc && react-native start --experimental-debugger
scripts.start:clean:debug: npm run lint && npm run tsc && react-native start --reset-cache --experimental-debugger
